title: Enna Solla Lyrics Thanga Magan Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Thanga Magan Enna Solla Lyrics 
English Meaning/Translation
The New life of Tamizh
Singer: Shweta Mohan
Lyrics: Dhanush

Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Enna solla
yedhu solla
kannodu kan pesa
vaartha illa

ennennavo ullukulla
vella sollaama
en vekkam thalla

chinna chinna aasa
ulla thikki thikki pesa.
malligapo vaasam
konjam kathoda veesa.

Uthu uthu paarkka
nenjil muthu muththaa verkka.
putham pudhu vazhka
yenna unnodu serka.

ennodu nee unnodu naan
onrodu naam ondraagum naal
ennodu nee unnodu naan
ondraagum naal. (2)

Sollaamal kollaamal
nenjodu kadhal sera
nenjodu kaadhal sera
moochu mutthudhey.

innaalum ennaalum
kai korthu pogum paadhai
kai korthu pogum paadhai
kannil thondrudhey

sollaadha ennangal
pollaadha aasaigal
unnale serudhey
baaram koodudhey.

thedaadha thedalgal
kaanaadha kaatchigal
unnodu kaanbadhil
neram pogudhey.

chinna chinna aasa
ulla thikki thikki pesa.
malligapo vaasam konjam
kathoda veesa.

Uthu uthu paarkka
nenjil muthu muththaa verkka.
putham pudhu vazhka
yenna unnodu serka.

ennodu nee unnodu naan
onrodu naam ondraagum naal
ennodu nee unnodu naan
ondraagum naal. (2)

Enna solla
yedhu solla
kannodu kan pesa
vaartha illa

ennennavo ullukulla
vella sollaama
en vekkam thalla		 English Meaning
I tried my best :)
what to say
what more to say
no words to speak
when eyes meet

many words inside
but my shame stops me
to tell others.

little little desires
stutter inside.
scent of jasmine,
smells in air.

a deep look,
makes to sweat inside.
a new life
adds me with you.

you’re with me, I’m with you
this is the day we join as one.
you’re with me, I’m with you
this is the day.

without telling
love gets into heart.
while love gets into heart
am breathless.

today and forever
the path we go together
I could see
the path we would go together.

untold thoughts,
wicked desires,
both joins coz of you
and increases the burden.

unsearched searches
unseen views
on seeing with you
moves the time fast

little little desires
stutter inside.
scent of jasmine,
smells in air.

a deep look,
makes to sweat inside.
a new life
adds me with you.

you’re with me, I’m with you
this is the day we join as one.
you’re with me, I’m with you
this is the day.

 what to say
what to say
no words to speak
when eyes meet

many words inside
but shame stops me
to tell others.
